list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: become or make smaller in size or amount.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the workforce has shrunk to less than a thousand
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lực lượng lao động đã giảm xuống ít hơn một ngàn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move back or away, especially because of fear or disgust.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she shrank away from him, covering her face
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy rây tránh xa anh ta, che mặt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a clinical psychologist, psychiatrist, or psychotherapist.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bạn sẽ thấy một cơn co
